Html:
I use typescript for windows 8 template http://www.sellsbrothers.com/Posts/Details/12724



the template only support 0.8.1.1 . Now I upgrade it to support 0.8.2 . But when I rebulid the project ,vs2012 tell me :

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\tsc" --sourcemap -target ES5 " exited with code 1.

There were some changes to the project file format between 0.8.1.1 and 0.8.2.

Though the blog page talks about compile-on-save, the majority of the information is how to upgrade a project file between 0.8.1.1 and 0.8.2:

http://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Compile-on-save&referringTitle=Documentation
